182.question: Do they inspect their model to see if their model learned to associate image parts with words related to entities?
182.response: {'Answer': 'Yes, the model was inspected to see if it learned to associate image parts with words related to entities. Figure 3 in the paper shows how the model was able to successfully predict the entity "Monopoly" in the image, which is a board game, and also predict the entity "Marshmello" which is the name of a music producer.'}

183.question: Do they inspect their model to see if their model learned to associate image parts with words related to entities?
183.response: {'Answer': 'Yes, the model was inspected to see if it learned to associate image parts with words related to entities. Figure 1 shows how the model uses visual context to recognize polysemous entity names and suppress word embeddings of unknown tokens.'}
